title: Popularly elected presidents in both Iran, Mexico

content.prompt: Which of the following is a similarity between the political systems of Mexico and Iran?

choices.label: Both countries have popularly elected presidents.
Both countries have a dominant-party system.
Both countries have legal systems based on Sharia law.
Both countries exclusively use single-member district elections.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
